forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 53F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. S winds shifting to WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. S winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 46F. ENE winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
